content: As an AI language model, I do not have real-time access to current promotion, sale or discount information on e-commerce websites. Therefore, I cannot provide you with specific information on any deals or discounts on walnuts on any particular website. However, you can visit the websites listed above, go to the walnuts section, and check if there are any ongoing promotions or sales available. You can also sign up for their newsletters to receive updates on sales and promotions or keep an eye out for seasonal or holiday sales where you can find good deals on walnuts.
